verses.name: Genesis 46:18
verses.text: These are the sons of Zilpah, whom Laban gave to Leah his daughter, and these she bare unto Jacob, even sixteen souls.

verses.name: Genesis 46:19
verses.text: The sons of Rachel Jacob’s wife; Joseph, and Benjamin.

verses.name: Genesis 46:20
verses.text: And unto Joseph in the land of Egypt were born Manasseh and Ephraim, which Asenath the daughter of Poti–pherah priest of On bare unto him.

verses.name: Genesis 46:21
verses.text: And the sons of Benjamin were Belah, and Becher, and Ashbel, Gera, and Naaman, Ehi, and Rosh, Muppim, and Huppim, and Ard.

verses.name: Genesis 46:22
verses.text: These are the sons of Rachel, which were born to Jacob: all the souls were fourteen.

verses.name: Genesis 46:23
verses.text: And the sons of Dan; Hushim.
